name: RockPaperScissorsMinusOne
0:
”Alexa open rock paper scissors minus one”
”Alexa play rock paper scissors minus one”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rock paper scissors minus one
Developer Terms of Use
des:
HOW TO PLAY:
Firstly, you need to choose Rock Paper or Scissors. Then your opponent will do the same. Once you have both chosen. Both of your choices are shown to the other player. Then, you both need to choose an option to remove! For example:

Player One: Rock Paper!
Player Two:
Paper Scissors

Now both players choose which one to remove at the same time.

Player One: Rock! Player Two: Paper!

Player Two Wins. Because Player One is left with paper and player two is left with Scissors. 

Rock Beats Scissors
Scissors Beat Paper
Paper Beats Rock

Have Fun!

HUGO.FM
